caption: Figure 4: Performance comparison of models on 6 general tasks and 4 specialized tasks.
description: The radar chart compares the performance of three models (Base Model, ReachQA-20k, and ReachQA-LLaVA-Mix-40k) across ten different benchmark tasks, including six general-purpose multimodal tasks and four specialized chart-related tasks.
section: 5.3 BALANCING GENERAL VISUAL UNDERSTANDING AND SPECIALIZED ABILITIES
